summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Turkish Sports & Bonus Network MVP. Backend APIs, frontend UI, navigation, interactive elements, and AI integration all working correctly.
passed_tests: All 28 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, bonus cards, live scores, FAQ accordion
Bonus card CTA buttons are clickable and functional
Filter functionality on bonus and sports pages
League selector and category filters working
Admin panel tabs and form interactions
AI content generation with GPT-5.2 integration
Article detail pages with Turkish content
Database seeding completed (5 bonus sites, 3 articles, 7 categories)
Sports data API returning mock data correctly
CRUD operations for bonus sites and articles
Professional dark theme with neon green accents
